channel.title: VanityScape (iceScape)
channel.description:
Welcome all to the DEVELOPMENT Anyways... so i've come back yes..... and i was bored... and i saw alot of threads about [pi] now i was wondering to myself WHAT THE HELL IS A PI? i thought it mean (person introuble) .... i was wrong.... well anyways i downloaded this [PI] and i thought hmmm.... why not do a development on it this is what i came up with...
Done So Far
I Fixed person following because when you followed someone you ended up in a wall... hmmm Fixed Trading no-one likes dupers :P Fixed up combat abit.. no more delays.... woohoo fixed up magic. You know the gfx hits before the (splash) very annoying. theres alot more ill add to it as i can remember... also when i do something i all it....
Now moving on.... i wanted to be diffrent... so i remade the whole of varrock kool eh...??? i thought this would be awsome to do so i went out and edited (tile by tile) (snow) hoo-rah!!! but that still didnt give it that whole effect... so i added in pebble paths.. hmm better?.... still... everything still didnt seem right... so i decided to go the full way... and make objects with snow on them etc trees... rocks and what ever else i could find.. (just have to put them in now..) yay me....
Anyways heres a couple of pictures to look at i will add some more as it progresses
[IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/facebookpic.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i802.photobucket.com/albums/yy308/h0p2it/facebook.jpg[/img]
Hate/rate W/e its something diffrent :P

item.title: VanityScape (iceScape)
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Cool, so it’s like snow right?

You should make it so there is a snow interface while your walking through varrock or wherever you want it to look like snow.

I could help you if you’d like, just pm me.

Goodluck.

Read full topic

item.title: VanityScape (iceScape)
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

teh_codex:

so your point is you want to start to criticism at someone mate? you think your so shit hot dont you?.. mate you might know more about me on a computer but life mate you fail… hate idiots like you that talk big on the computer you might be big through a computer but are you in real life?.

  1. I do think I’m “hot shit” because I can actually program Java pretty well, if you saw my development thread.

  2. If you post anything in a development thread, you should expect criticism. If you would jar been honest instead of trying to act like… Like hot shit, you wouldn’t have been bombarded with these posts.

  3. I swear to god, when I read your post, my eyes were bleeding. There are … After EVERY SINGLE DAMN SENTANCE.

  4. What do you mean “your back”? I’ve been on RSPS 4 years and I never heard of “Teh Codex”.

  5. If you want a proper argument setup, try using grammar instead of bunched up words and other correct facts to prop up your point.

  6. Stop posting. Clearly, I don’t want to fight anymore; this happened as a result to your wannabe know it all post of “amgg ye I en pro codar!!1! Eye cen maek java cool stof!!1!”, so just stop posting.

/end of discussion

Read full topic

item.title: VanityScape (iceScape)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“teh_codex, post:20, topic:393837”][quote author=Nexus_ link=topic=491022.msg3591610#msg3591610 date=1304688848]

[quote author=teh_codex link=topic=491022.msg3591453#msg3591453 date=1304659994]

[quote author=Nexus_ link=topic=491022.msg3591374#msg3591374 date=1304652624]

I am jelly of your snow, would be awesome if you explained how you did that lol.
[/quote] it was easy abit of java knowledge

Are you kidding me? JAVA KNOWLEDGE? All you do is change some cache using a cach editor, replacing some tiles to white. If you call that Java knowledge, your retarded. There’s no other way to put it.
[/quote] yeah java knowledge wtf do you think the map editor is made from a cmd idiot… Its made from java LOL and yes there is java knowledge the rs2 map editor you have to edit the files for it to work on a 474 so if you think it is that easy please be my guest i will send you the client base i used please feel free to prove me wrong show me its as simple as you say. if it was why font a lot of people release it hmm?.. think before you speak.

Dude I’m laughing my ass off.

The damn program is made from Java you retard, that’s like saying you know HTML and PHP when you open a forum. Your really retarded.

My sister who’s 7 can open Toms Cache Suite and change a couple variables and colors. You sir, are either trolling badly, or your extremely… Retarded, there’s no other way to put it.

Oh, and people don’t “release how to do it” because it would be like releasing a tutorial on how to download a source. Holy nigger Jesus, your stupid.
[/quote] so your point is you want to start to criticism at someone mate? you think your so shit hot dont you?.. mate you might know more about me on a computer but life mate you fail… hate idiots like you that talk big on the computer you might be big through a computer but are you in real life?.[/quote]
First of all, you can’t seriously expect to be praised for releasing a development were your only major thing you did was change the ground in the cache, the reason for this section is for criticism, even if you don’t like it its what makes us learn more. Second, why are you bringing into the point that were talking shit threw the computer? We all live in different parts on the country and world, but if we were next door neighbors I doubt you would post this because everyone would be calling you a retard in person. Third of all don’t be a hypocrite, you say you hate people who hide behind a computer and flame, yet thats exactly what you do when someone posts feedback. You obviously can’t handle the internet or critisim, so maybe you just shouldn’t respond to people who post it.

Read full topic

item.title: VanityScape (iceScape)
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

[quote=“Nexus_, post:18, topic:393837”][quote author=teh_codex link=topic=491022.msg3591453#msg3591453 date=1304659994]

[quote author=Nexus_ link=topic=491022.msg3591374#msg3591374 date=1304652624]

I am jelly of your snow, would be awesome if you explained how you did that lol.
[/quote] it was easy abit of java knowledge

Are you kidding me? JAVA KNOWLEDGE? All you do is change some cache using a cach editor, replacing some tiles to white. If you call that Java knowledge, your retarded. There’s no other way to put it.
[/quote] yeah java knowledge wtf do you think the map editor is made from a cmd idiot… Its made from java LOL and yes there is java knowledge the rs2 map editor you have to edit the files for it to work on a 474 so if you think it is that easy please be my guest i will send you the client base i used please feel free to prove me wrong show me its as simple as you say. if it was why font a lot of people release it hmm?.. think before you speak.

Dude I’m laughing my ass off.

The damn program is made from Java you retard, that’s like saying you know HTML and PHP when you open a forum. Your really retarded.

My sister who’s 7 can open Toms Cache Suite and change a couple variables and colors. You sir, are either trolling badly, or your extremely… Retarded, there’s no other way to put it.

Oh, and people don’t “release how to do it” because it would be like releasing a tutorial on how to download a source. Holy nigger Jesus, your stupid.[/quote] so your point is you want to start to criticism at someone mate? you think your so shit hot dont you?.. mate you might know more about me on a computer but life mate you fail… hate idiots like you that talk big on the computer you might be big through a computer but are you in real life?.

Read full topic
